title: Almost Eras...but not quite
content:
Hi guys...my first post so be gentle ;))

It's almost Eras - but the lower case 'k' and 't' are quite distinctive as is the ampersand. There's quite a break in th UC 'K' and 'P' too.

Any help gratefully accepted.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829234131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_5381.JPG)
author: RichardK2014

comments.content: My studio dept thanks you! So do I, have a nice weekend!
